targetLine.text: All right then, LEAVE! And take your book with ya!
targetLine.movie: Back to the Future Part II

contextBefore.text: It's "leave", you idiot! "Make like a tree, and leave"! You sound like a damn fool when you say it wrong!

contextAfter.text: Don't you get it? You could make a fortune with this book. Let me show you.
UCLA trails 17-16. It's 4th and 11 with only 18 seconds left of this game. I'd say it's all over for UCLA!
Bet you a million bucks UCLA wins it 19-17.

movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-ii: Back to the Future Part II
movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-iii: Back to the Future Part III
